Text:
OK, sorry for all the comments, but i made this "hack" into a quick auto install file.

All you have to do is Install PS and/or DW to the default directories, then open my "ps+dw_patch.exe" file and click "Install".

Thats is, then u have PS Extended &/or DW
I tested it and it works perfectly.

Patch file Download Link: 
http://download.yousendit.com/3790115705275D33
I've been testing Brad's script and i think that it might NOT work under non-english versions of windows.
this worked for me where the ZWT extended keygen did not.
WORKS!!! Together with the exe crack it works like a charm! Using the keygen at first made my license expire for no reason!
Thanks mate. Get the exe crack for full usage
